turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hello, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hey, I was wondering if you can help me make an order at Starbucks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a venti venti vanilla latte with caramel.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you say a venti latte with caramel?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind of milk would you like?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so your order is venti vanilla latte with caramel and whole milk, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: where would you like to pick it up?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Looking at the closest one to me is.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: the Starbucks on U Street in Fresno.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your coffee will be ready for pickup soon at the starbucks on you st.
